job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongAbout Us strongppbrppAtoB is building Stripe for Transportation  modernizing payments infrastructure in the trucking industry ppThis is an exciting opportunity to join an early stage startup working in a huge industry with over a trillion dollars in transaction flow Trucking is the backbone of the American economy and we have identified opportunities to replace the broken payments infrastructure amp help small businessesppbrppbrppstrongBackground strongppbrppWe have raised over 25 million in venture capital from investors such as General Catalyst Bloomberg Beta Y Combinator founders and CEOs of companies like Google Eric Schmidt Salesforce Mark Benioff Coinbase DoorDash Instacart Segment Gusto Figma CxOs and founding team members of Uber PayPal and Stripe angels like Elad Gil Naval Ravikant Gokul Rajaram and ESG funds such as Climate Capital Human Capital Leadout among othersppbrppOur founding team has backgrounds working on autonomous vehicles at Cruise Automation leading ops and growth for Uber engineering at Amazon building apps that were featured on the Apple app store working on small business credit at Square amp Goldman Sachs among others We are excited to open up more seats in this rocket ship ppbrppbrppstrongAbout the Role strongppbrppWe are looking for a customercentric staff level Data Scientist to join our teamppbrppYou will help solve some of AtoBs most challenging business goals through highprofile work and inspiring thought leadership Youll get to flex your statistical and machine learning models skills to tackle problems like risk estimation and optimization anomaly detection and experimentation design and analysis for new algorithmfeatureproduct launches Youll work with leadership and multifunctional partners to solve broader data science problems create data science vision and guide the teams direction through datadriven insights and algorithmic thinking ppbrppstrongIn this role you will strongppbrpulliDevelop creative solutions and build prototypes to business problems using algorithms based on machine learning statistics and optimization and work with engineeringproduct to productionize those algorithms and create impact in productionliliDrive clarity and solve ambiguous challenging business problems using datadriven approachesliliWork closely with multifunctional leads to develop technical vision and drive the team directionliliPropose and guide the framework of data analysis to drive business insight and facilitate decisions Establish standard methodologies for data science including modeling coding analytics and experimentationliliProvide technical mentorship for engineers and junior data scientists within and outside your teamliliCommunicate with senior management and multifunctional teamsliulpbrppstrongWere looking for someone who hasstrongppbrpulliMS or PhD degree in Statistics Machine Learning Operations Research or other quantitative fields Alternatively a BS with 2 or more years of experience in relevant fieldsliliKnowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics machine learning optimization economics and analyticsliliExperience in experimental design and analysis eg AB and marketlevel experiments causal inferenceliliExperience in algorithm development and prototypingliliExperience in ML tooling such as Airflow Spark etcliliCoding proficiency and ability to develop statistical analysis and prototype algorithms in PythonliliProficiency in SQL Python SparkliliPreferred Experience with productionizing algorithms for realtime systemsliliPreferred Deep understanding of Bayesian modelingliul
